channel.title: Vs Monster Items
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Vs Monster Items" - Item's that add damage to the Monsters.

item.title: Re: Vs Monster Items
item.content:encoded:
I noticed that this info was already at wiki page for Hikers.

Sorry.

item.title: Vs Monster Items
item.content:encoded:
While fighting Monster called Psycho Hikers I got info 5HP Damage by Knapsack.

This line was just under Health bar of the monster after my attack.

Does that mean all monster have permanent items that help to fight them?

Anyone noticed this before?
